title: Importance of Education In CBD Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Mike Donnelly is a former Navy SEAL who, with his wife Claudia, founded a hemp-derived CBD company focused on giving back to the veteran community. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the saturation of the market, why CBD is especially good for dogs and the wonders of cannabinoids. They also talk about building the American Dream, starting a 501(c)(3) for veterans and why no one's actually buying CBD from Amazon. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
